dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: You're getting an 'F', end of story. No, I don't accept appeals.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: It's only morning. Keep it down.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: This won't do. This won't do at all. Haah... Why don't we go out for some air? I just seem to lose all momentum at this time of day.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: None of us are going to sleep until we deal with this task, understood? I don't care if we have to work through the night—just get it done.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Now, brief me on your capabilities.
'Command' and 'consultations'...? I... okay. I see. Still, contribute as much as you are able to the production of this work. We're doing a group project—I won't accept any freeloaders.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
We wear white not because we're stupid and don't know that it stains easily.
We wear white because clothes stained with all kinds of color at the end of the grueling artistic process is, in of itself, a piece of art that deserves appreciation.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
As a rule, one out of five participants in most group projects are unsalvageable scum who have nothing to contribute to the team effort.
Going by that rule, I bet this group has at least two or three such members.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: There are more 'dots' to this world than the ones drawn with a brush. A hole. A wound. A gaze. Barbed wires. The possibilities are endless.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
You there, wait. Stand still. Hm... would you allow me to puncture three little holes in your heart? I must say, it should make for a rather fascinating—
... Why are they running? Team! Get over here and seize them, stat!

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Are your eyes glazing over? Focus.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Do you understand the allure of contours of light and shadow? The beauty born from countless collections of dots? No? Then allow me to enlighten you.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: If you wish to have me on your team, then the rest of the group better be up to my standards.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Gather around, everyone. It's time to discuss our project.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I'm still in the conceptualization phase. Be quick about it.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: A sound opinion. Let's go with that.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: The rough sketch is complete. Now be quick and paint over it.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Agh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: This artwork is complete. Let us critique it once we return.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: I should've gotten... better teammates...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I expect that our group project will receive a commendable review. And it's all thanks to me.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ... Such tribulations are but an expected part of pursuing the path of art.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I'll give this performance a 'B'. Not bad, not great.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: A+. What an artful battle that was.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: If you consider this mess you call 'command' an art... then I have to flunk you.
